languages.text: {n}Лоб Абеляра пересекают многочисленные морщины.{/n} "Парсимус Девейн? Я впервые слышу имя этой династии Вольных Торговцев..."
{n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが眉をひそめた。{/n}「パルシムス・ドウェイン？そんな自由開拓者の家系は聞いたことはありませんが…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが眉をひそめた。{/n}「パルシムス・ドウェイン？そんな自由開拓者の家系は聞いたことはありませんが…」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“帕西姆斯·德维恩？我从来没听说过哪个行商浪人家族叫这个名字……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“帕西姆斯·德维恩？我从来没听说过哪个行商浪人家族叫这个名字……”

languages.text: {n}El ceño de Abelard se frunce.{/n} «¿Parsimus Dewain? No conozco esa casa de Comerciantes Independientes...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ceño de Abelard se frunce.{/n} «¿Parsimus Dewain? No conozco esa casa de Comerciantes Independientes...».

languages.text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Parsimus Dewain ? C'est la première fois que j'entends parler de cette famille de libres-marchands... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Parsimus Dewain ? « C'est la première fois que j'entends parler de cette famille de libres-marchands... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? Von so einem Freihändlerhaus habe ich noch nie gehört ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? Von so einem Freihändlerhaus habe ich noch nie gehört ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain mi? Bu adda bir Hür Tacir hanesi hiç duymadım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's brow furrows.{/n} "Parsimus Dewain? I've never heard of such a Rogue Trader house..."
